      • deleteSelectedPart

        public static void deleteSelectedPart​(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Part> partTable)
        Deletes selected part after confirmation. If no part is selected, an error is displayed.
        Parameters:
        partTable - Part table of Main form

      • searchPartValue

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> searchPartValue​(java.lang.String search)
        Populates Part table in Main form with parts that have part names that match the value entered into search bar in Parts pane of Main form. If no matches are found, allParts is displayed.
        Parameters:
        search - Value entered into search bar in the Part pane of the Main form
        Returns:
        Parts with matching part names to entered value, or all parts if no matches are found

      • searchPart

        public static void searchPart​(javafx.scene.control.TextField partSearchBar,
                              javafx.scene.control.TableView<Part> partTable)
        If a part name match is not found by searchPartValue, then parts with a matching part number are highlighted in the Parts table in the Main form RUNTIME ERROR: Technically a bug, not an error, occurred here that cancelled the filter-by-string because I originally had partTable.setItems(getAllParts()) here, and it kept overriding the search results.
        Parameters:
        partSearchBar - Value entered into search bar in Parts pane of the Main form
        partTable - Part table in Main form

      • partMatchSearch

        public static boolean partMatchSearch​(java.lang.String search)
        Determines if value entered into search bar in the Parts pane of the Main form matches a Part ID or Part Name of a part in the Parts table in the Main form
        Parameters:
        search - Value entered into search bar in the Parts pane of the Main form
        Returns:
        True if either a Part ID or Part Name search match is found; false if no matches are found

      • deleteSelectedProduct

        public static void deleteSelectedProduct​(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Product> productTable)
        Deletes selected product after confirmation. If no product is selected or the product has associated parts, an error is displayed.
        Parameters:
        productTable - Part table of Main form

      • searchProductValue

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> searchProductValue​(java.lang.String search)
        Populates Product table in Main form with parts that have part names that match the value entered into search bar in Product pane of Main form. If no matches are found, allProducts is displayed.
        Parameters:
        search - Value entered into search bar in the Product pane of the Main form
        Returns:
        Products with matching product names to entered value, or all products if no matches are found

      • searchProduct

        public static void searchProduct​(javafx.scene.control.TextField productSearchBar,
                                 javafx.scene.control.TableView<Product> productTable)
        If a product name match is not found by searchProductValue, then product with a matching product number are highlighted in the Products table in the Main form
        Parameters:
        productSearchBar - Value entered into search bar in Products pane of the Main form
        productTable - Product table in Main form

      • productMatchSearch

        public static boolean productMatchSearch​(java.lang.String search)
        Determines if value entered into search bar in the Products pane of the Main form matches a Product ID or Product Name of a product in the Product table in the Main form
        Parameters:
        search - Value entered into search bar in the Products pane of the Main form
        Returns:
        True if either a Product ID or Product Name search match is found; false if no matches are found
